name: Petr Novotný 0001
content: Homepage of Petr Novotný - Homepage of Petr Novotný Petr Novotný Follow Brno, Czech Republic Masaryk University Email DBLP Google Scholar I work as an associate professor at the Faculty of Informatics, Masaryk University, Brno, Czech Republic. My chief research interests are risk-aware reinforcement learning, verification of probabilistic systems and programs, and application of formal methods in AI (particularly in decision making under uncertainty). At our faculty, I serve as a faculty senator, an ombudsman for PhD students (together with my colleague Katarína Furmanová), and a member of the Fundamentals of Computer Science Doctoral Committee. News September 2025: We are looking for motivated students to join our Formela seminar on strategic AI! August 2025: In the PC od TACAS’26. June 2025: Giving a talk on risk-constrained planning and learning at Singapore Management University. April 2025: Our paper Taming Infinity one Chunk at a Time: Concisely Represented Strategies in One-Counter MDPs was accepted ay ICALP’25! February 2025: I am attending AAAI’25 in Philadelphia. If you’d like to connect, feel free to reach out to me! December 2024: Our paper Refuting Equivalence in Probabilistic Programs with Conditioning was accepted at TACAS’25! December 2024: Our paper Bidding Games on Markov Decision Processes with Quantitative Reachability Objectives was accepted at AAMAS’25! December 2024: Our paper Threshold UCT: Cost-Constrained Monte Carlo Tree Search with Pareto Curves was accepted for oral presentation at AAAI’25! News archive
